### h3 *italic* **bold** allure core ![https://img.shields.io/teamcity/http/teamcity.qatools.ru/s/allure_core_master_deploy.svg?style=flat](https://img.shields.io/teamcity/http/teamcity.qatools.ru/s/allure_core_master_deploy.svg?style=flat) [repository](https://github.com/allure-framework/allure-core)
just http://yandex.ru

failure.message: AssertionError: Text on current page should be correct Expected: element text is "Yandex" but: <[[PhantomJSDriver: phantomjs on MAC (9e679b20-5085-11e4-ad6d-87edf8da84a7)] -> css selector: title]> text is ""
